sections.title: Introduction
sections.content:
Note: **This article or section does not follow the Laptop page guidelines.** This article or section does not follow the Laptop page guidelines.

This article or section does not follow the Laptop page guidelines.

The Lenovo Legion Go is a gaming-focused PC handheld by Lenovo. It features a AMD Ryzen Z1 Extreme processor, LPDDR5x-7500 shared memory, and a Radeon 780M with 12 CUs and up to 2.7 GHz clock speed.

sections.title: Installation
sections.content: The device comes preloaded with Windows. It can be used to update the BIOS via a Installer File before installing Arch. Disable Secure Boot in the BIOS.
